package.name: dsExtDirectPlugin
package.summary: A symfony adaptation of the Ext.Direct JSON-RPC router and API Spec
package.description: The dsExtDirectPlugin is a symfony adaptation of the Ext.Direct JSON-RPC router and API for the Ext Js 3.x framework. Ext.Direct provides a single interface to build AJAX-driven applications in Ext Js 3.x quickly and reliably.

release.notes: * Added more comprehensive error handling * Removed name parameter from generator to prevent confusion * Added @extdirect-action option to customize action name and @extdirect-method to customize method name

* Added ability to look inside plugins for extdirect-enable actions * Removed messages from exceptions in non-debug mode * Added better exception handling for forwards from an action or filter * Fixed bug where a formhandler request may be falsely interpreted as a file upload * Fixed bug where file upload requests were failing * Enhanced error handler to not throw exception for PHP errors if errors are suppressed * Fixed bug where len value was cast as a string causing Ext would throw this.onRead error

* Added _raw request parameter for access to all request data * Removed automatic scanning of all plugins in favor of manually specified plugins (to prevent failed API generation for some plugins using auto classes) * Removed error handler - caused too many issues with external libraries * Added action namespace support * Fixed bug where app.yml params were not being pulled because of environment
